name: The Vaulted Reception Rooms and Museum of Leon
description:
DESCRIPTION
On the banks of the Saône, enjoy extensive terraces and front yard for your cocktail reception or ceremony, at this unique venue in Lyon. Nature and well-being destination guaranteed for a unique event that will remain etched in your memories.
The whole team is at your service for you to discover this extraordinary place, which combines a vaulted stone reception room and museum, both of which can be fully privatised for you and your guests. This venue will provide you with a reception room that can accommodate up to 180 people for your wedding meal. You can also enjoy the park, the gardens and the terrace for your cocktail or your reception.
Your reception can be catered for by the experience team and the event can be tailored to your individual requirements. Everything is possible with us, any project is feasible you just have to talk with us.
The venue combines modern terraces for your ceremony and photos, which can be privatized over several days, for the evening and brunch. A large reception room for the wedding dinner and breakfast and another vaulted stone room perfect for a DJ or a band that will make you dance all night.
There is plenty of accommodation nearby and all elements of your reception can be included in a bespoke package. A partnership with a hotel at 5min by car or 10min by foot is proposed or there are many airbnb near the domain.
The venue team will be happy to welcome you for this special day, from Monday to Sunday, during the day or in the evening. The service includes furniture as well as a kitchen equipped with a fridge and an ice maker, and cleaning is included. A car park will allow your guests to park their vehicles and nearby beds will allow you to spend the night near the domain.
Details:
3 rooms from 100 to 400m2,
Privatization of the Museum
Boule Ground
Parking - Audio equipment - Wi-F - Air conditioning
Free caterer with fully-equipped kitchen available
From 20 to 180 people in the reception rooms.
Up to 1,200 people outdoors.
20 min From Gare Lyon - Part-Dieu
30 minutes from Lyon Saint-Exupéry airport
For further information then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to help.
